A 12 bit ADC is employed to convert an analog voltage of zero to 10 volts. The resolution of the ADC is
explanation:
Full scale measurement range = 0 to 10 volts.

ADC resolution is 12 bits: 2^12 = 4096 quantization levels.

ADC voltage resolution is: (10-0)/4096 = 0.00244 volts = 2.44 mV.
